I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.

participant_2.background:
I left McDonalds because I wanted to pursue my passion for dancing.
i like to make my own clothes.
I'm worried about how my family would react if I told them I was gay.
sometimes i feel like i ve already been through life once before.
I'd like to learn how to defend myself.

content.text: Hi there! What's your favorite thing to do?
Hi! I love dancing! I left my job at McDonalds so I could pursue my passion.
That's awesome! I love to eat fresh and flavorful food. I once saw Peyton Manning at the grocery store!
Wow! That's amazing! I've always wanted to be a professional dancer. I'm worried about how my family would react if I told them I was gay.
I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have a support system outside of your family?
Yes, I have a few close friends who support me. I'd also like to learn how to defend myself.
That's great! I'm glad you have a support system. I've never been to a fortune teller, because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
That's a great outlook on life! I've never been to one either, but I'm curious to know what they would say about me.
I'm sure they would say something great! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to make my own clothes and go to the movies. I also sing in the school chorus.
That's awesome! I love going to the movies too. I saw a really good movie last week.
Oh yeah? What was it about?
It was about a group of friends who go on a road trip. It was really funny!
Sounds like a good movie! I'll have to check it out.
